timeline.bodyText: this is a geopolitical issue; Ossetia is still recognized by most countries as part of Georgia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_Ossetia). It is probably coming from some of the changed population figures, so we should check those carefully, and maybe special-case them for now.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1926,8 +1934,8 @@ not be patched by hand, as any changes made in that fashion may be lost.
 		<!--{ Orokolo; ?; ? } => { Orokolo; Latin; Unknown Region }-->
 		<likelySubtag from="oru" to="oru_Arab_ZZ"/>
 		<!--{ Ormuri; ?; ? } => { Ormuri; Arabic; Unknown Region }-->
-		<likelySubtag from="os" to="os_Cyrl_GE"/>
-		<!--{ Ossetic; ?; ? } => { Ossetic; Cyrillic; Georgia }-->
+		<likelySubtag from="os" to="os_Cyrl_RU"/>

replies.bodyText: OK , would we ideally leave the likelySubtag  and default content as is?
replies.author: srl295

timeline.message:
CLDR-14118 update likelySubtags and maximalLocales

- defaultContent changed from os_GE to os_RU
- Exemplars: Renamed izi -> eza and dud -> uth
- Also exemplars: deleted daf - see [CLDR-14136]
- changed TestIdentity so it always runs on all files, not just exhaustive (12s to 27s)
- changed DeriveScripts to produce better error messages

CLDR-14118 update likelySubtags and maximalLocales

- changed os_GE speakers to 4.08% per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ossetian_language
- Exemplars: Renamed izi -> eza and dud -> uth
- Also exemplars: deleted daf - see [CLDR-14136]
- changed TestIdentity so it always runs on all files, not just exhaustive (12s to 27s)
- changed DeriveScripts to produce better error messages

CLDR-14118 update likelySubtags and maximalLocales

- changed os_GE speakers to 4.08% per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ossetian_language
- Add a specific test verifying os_GE as defaultContent.
- Exemplars: Renamed izi -> eza and dud -> uth
- Also exemplars: deleted daf - see [CLDR-14136]
- changed TestIdentity so it always runs on all files, not just exhaustive (12s to 27s)
- changed DeriveScripts to produce better error messages

CLDR-14118 update likelySubtags and maximalLocales

- changed os_GE speakers to 4.08% per https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ossetian_language
- Add a specific test verifying os_GE as defaultContent.
- Exemplars: Renamed izi -> eza and dud -> uth
- Also exemplars: deleted daf - see [CLDR-14136]
- changed TestIdentity so it always runs on all files, not just exhaustive (12s to 27s)
- changed DeriveScripts to produce better error messages
